'''Udumbara Pistil''' is a [[Quest Item]] found in the [[Girdle of the Sands]]. It can be given to [[Pari]] during the [[World Quests]] ''[[Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (Asipattravana Swamp)]]'' and ''[[Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 2)]]''.

The 6 Udumbara can be found along the walls of [[Asipattravana Swamp]].
